actions.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment to increase funds for the creation and promotion of translated materials and other programs that support the assistance of persons with limited English proficiency in utilizing the services provided by HUD by $150,000.
purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the creation and promotion of translated materials and other programs that support the assistance of persons with limited English proficiency in utilizing the services provided by HUD by $150,000.
